de.latlon.deejump.wfs.data

Class JUMPFeatureFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.latlon.deejump.wfs.data.JUMPFeatureFactory

  • public class JUMPFeatureFactory
extends Object
    Utility functions to create different kinds of FeatureDatasets.
    Further methods provided for JUMPlon implemented by UT
    Author:
    Ugo Taddei

      • createFeatureRequest

        public org.deegree.ogcwebservices.wfs.operation.GetFeature createFeatureRequest(String version,
                                                                                QualifiedName qualName,
                                                                                org.deegree.model.spatialschema.Envelope envelope)
        Creates a deegree WFSGetFeatureRequest based on the WFS version, the feature name ( typeName) and the envelope.
        This method was adapted from DownloadListener.
        Parameters:
        version - the WFS version
        qualName - the feature (type) name
        envelope - the box inside of which data has been requested
        Returns:
        a wfs GetFeature request

                                                                                  InputStream is,

                                                                           throws DeeJUMPException
        Creates a deegree FeatureCollection from a given GetFeature request to a server.
        Parameters:
        server - the URL of the WFS server
        request - the GetFeature request
        featureType - if non null, a DescribeFeatureType will be performed to get the correct schema
        Returns:
        a deegree FeatureCollection
        Throws:
        DeeJUMPException

      • createFromDeegreeFC

        public FeatureCollection createFromDeegreeFC(org.deegree.model.feature.FeatureCollection deegreeFeatCollec,
                                             com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry defaultGeometry,
                                             AbstractWFSWrapper wfs,
                                             QualifiedName ftName)
                                      throws DeeJUMPException
        Creates a JUMP FeatureCollection from a deegree FeatureCollection [UT] and a specified JUMP/JTS Geometry object. The new JUMP FeatureCollection returned will have the defaultGeometry as its GEOM attribute
        Parameters:
        deegreeFeatCollec - the deegree FeatureCollection
        defaultGeometry - the geometry of the returned FeatureCollection
        wfs - if the data came from a wfs, this can be used to determine the feature type even without any features
        ftName - the requested feature type from the above wfs
        Returns:
        the new JUMP FeatureCollection
        Throws:
        DeeJUMPException
